text:
Hi Team
I am encountering an issue when trying to add a GraphQL file to a module. I have created multiple files in our portal, but only four files are showing in the dropdown menu. When I attempt to create a new file, the previously created file is removed from all modules, and the newly created file is added to all modules. Additionally, if I change a file within the same theme but in a different module, the file in the previous module also changes. For example, I have created two modules: "Course Search" and "Course Details." When I change a file within the "Course Details" module, the file in the "Course Search" module also changes. Furthermore, previous files are not showing in the dropdown. Is there a limit to the number of files that can be created?, I want to use 2 different files in different module
